nodes.text: The Sand Splitters were a group of criminals who operated on the planet Tatooine during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The Human Saul Rouse and the Trandoshan Erib Kurrugh were both members of the organization.

Circa 1 ABY, the Sand Spittlers stole a book, a bell and a prototype warhead known as the Candle from the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure, and took the items to a cave in the Tatooine desert. However, Jabba's associciate Ree-Yees hired a spacer to recover the items from the Sand Splitters.
